text: Anna Odobescu (born 3 November 1991) is a Moldovan-Transnistrian singer. In 2019, she was selected to represent Moldova at the Eurovision Song Contest 2019 with her song "Stay". Her Eurovision performance consisted of her singing while sand artist Kseniya Simonova joined her on stage. Odobescu received 85 points in the semi-final but finished in 12th place, meaning she did not qualify to the grand final and was eliminated from the contest. In 2020, she appeared as herself in the movie Eurovision Song Contest: The Story of Fire Saga. == Sources == Category:1991 births Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Living people Category:Moldovan singers
title: Anna Odobescu
